remarks: The modular law is implied by the closure of subspace sum.  Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
shmod.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
shmod.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
shmod.3 $e |- C e. SH $.
shmodi $p |- ( ( ( A +H B ) = ( A vH B ) /\ A C_ C ) -> ( ( A vH B ) i^i C ) C_ ( A vH ( B i^i C ) ) ) $.
